title: Dawn Butler – 2023 Comments After Commons Report Published that Boris Johnson Knowingly Lied to Parliament
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Dawn Butler, the Labour MP for Brent Central, on Twitter on 15 June 2023.
content: Here’s evidence Johnson was lying, he knew he was lying, we knew he was lying, & he knew we knew he was lying. He manipulated our democratic systems to protect & amplify lies he gaslit the whole nation. [#privilegesCommittee](https://twitter.com/hashtag/privilegesCommittee?src=hashtag_click) I feel vindicated but our system needs to change.
